EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status NO_FUEL with warning “out of fuel” and furnace_source containing 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status NO_INGREDIENTS with 2 units of coal and furnace_result holding 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs, research set to automation; status NO_POWER and electrical_id updated to 10144.
- ElectricityGroup with id=10144 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage=0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection points (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5); status NOT_CONNECTED with warnings [“not connected to power network”, “no input liquid”, “no fluid present in connections”].
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) now in FULL_OUTPUT status after refueling; fuel inventory contains 1 coal, connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5), a fluid_box holding ~200 units of water and 200 units of steam (at 165°), and fluid_system updated to [37604].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding 100 units of water at 15° and fluid_system updated to [37604].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37604 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37605 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37606 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37611 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37610 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status FULL_OUTPUT (transporting steam).
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37615 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37614 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=37617 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status EMPTY.
- Note: Despite multiple pipeline connection attempts, the steam engine remains unconnected.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
─ Fluid System Identifier Mismatch and Invalid ID Usage:
  • Repeated attempts to connect using fluid_system IDs [37260, 37303, 37346, 37389, 37432, 37475, 37561] did not correspond to any working PipeGroup. Always retrieve and use the current valid fluid_system (now [37604]) from the boiler or offshore pump.
─ Rigid Pipeline Stabilization:
  • Fixed 10-second delays for pipeline stabilization proved insufficient; adopt dynamic connectivity checks to ensure PipeGroup readiness before initiating connection attempts.
─ Persistently Failed Steam Engine Connection and Direct Pipeline Failures:
  • Repeated connection attempts—including direct piping between the boiler and steam engine—failed due to misaligned or blocked connection points. Verify that source and target connection points are unobstructed and compatible for fluid transfer.
─ Fuel Supply Management:
  • Initial failure to fuel the boiler led to subsequent connection issues. Maintain timely refueling to achieve a FULL_OUTPUT status before attempting pipeline connections.
